meanings.definition: The process of forming ideas or concepts.
meanings.sent1: Her ideation led to a brilliant solution to the problem.
meanings.sent2: Creative ideation is essential for innovation.
meanings.sent3: His ideation about building a rocket out of cardboard was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The ideation of a world without borders sparked his imagination.
meanings.sent5: The ideation of a flying car captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The act of generating ideas or thoughts.
meanings.sent1: Teamwork can enhance ideation in brainstorming sessions.
meanings.sent2: Effective ideation is crucial for project development.
meanings.sent3: Their ideation of a robot chef made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The ideation of a new marketing strategy revolutionized the company.
meanings.sent5: The ideation of a time machine fascinated the young students.
